creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: four figures in Renaissance-era clothing lowering a dead body into a grave; two women at R, one looks outward, and the other one prays; another man stands to the far R; crown of thorns LLC, and opening to cave in background
marks: Signature and Date monogram and date in plate at lower right: [1512 /
title: The Entombment
